Occupation History:
Furrer Jost Suter is a 54 year old Hedge Fund Manager from Austria. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Furrer Jost Suter's first role was as a Stockbroker at CA Immo, where he worked diligently from 1995 to 1997 to establish a strong reputation.
In 1999, he moved to Immofinanz AG to work as a Portfolio Manager, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
He spent 24 years working as a Hedge Fund Manager at Conwert Immobilien Invest AG, refining his expertise and building a strong network.
